title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
creator_credit: Kroyer Films, Youngheart Productions, FAI Films, 20th Century Fox, Diana Young, Peter Faiman, Jim Cox, Bill Kroyer and Wayne Young
headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 1992
brief_description: When a sprite named Crysta shrinks a human boy, Zak, down to her size, he vows to help the magical fairy folk stop a greedy logging company from destroying their home: the pristine rainforest known as FernGully. Zak and his new friends fight to defend FernGully from lumberjacks — and the vengeful spirit they accidentally unleash after chopping down a magic tree.

constellations_other.name: There is no Planet B
constellations_other.description: While the climate emergency is very real, inspiring thousands and thousands of students to strike, documentaries, animated movies and dystopian genre films have warned about a world ravaged by global warming.
